Name: Blocks!: Hammer of the Scots
About the game: Hammer of the Scots main campaign and first scenario bring the rebellion of the Braveheart , William Wallace, to life. As the English player, you seek to pacify Scotland by controlling all the important noble lords. The Scottish player also seeks the allegiance of nobles to support a difficult struggle for freedom. You can also play another scenario the fight of Robert the Bruce, the Bandit King, to regain the independence of his kingdom. Or play the combined grand campaign scenario with both the Wallace rebellion and Bruce uprising in succession. Estimated Playtime: 2h00. Favored Side: none. Hardest to Play: none.
